itunes:title: ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚Lou Williams & Akeem Ali in the trap! w/ Karlous Miller & Clayton English! #85southshow
description:
He's a legend for more than basketball! Lou Williams is in the trap talking bout it all. From chillin with Drake in the 6 to how he got the name Lemon Pepper Lou! Hear his side of the story and how he came all the way up! Plus Akeem Ali returns to the couch! Plus Karlous Miller and Clayton English talk bout Dr. Dre's broke daughter and Shannon Sharpe comments lol.

Lou will gives some pointers on how to have two girlfriends!


GET TICKETS TO OUR NEXT LIVE SHOW SEPT. 11TH in JACKSONVILLE!

https://www.ticketmaster.com/85-south...


Akeem Ali returns and he breaks down his multiple personalities and give us some in sight into what's next with his music! This is the coldest podcast!


Hit Our Website for more info: https://www.85southshow.com/

Get our custom merchandise: https://85apparelco.com/

Subscribe To our Channel: bitly.com/85tube

WATCH KARLOUS' MILLER's COMEDY SPECIAL! https://vimeo.com/ondemand/karlousmil...



FOLLOW THE CREW


KARLOUS MILLER - https://www.facebook.com/karlousm/

DCYOUNGFLY - https://www.facebook.com/DcYoungFly1/

CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/


Director - JOE T. NEWMAN - www.ayoungplayer.com

Producer CHAD OUBRE - https://www.instagram.com/chadoubre/

Producer - LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_corleone_/

It's Jon - https://www.instagram.com/holaj_o_n/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
